author: Nelson Hunt
comment: Does nothing? Change items in Settings, but nothing changes the watchface.  Says it's now "on wearable device," but not so. How difficult should it be to install a watchface?

author: Brian Attard Montalto
comment: It's a very elegant watchface and I use it quite often. What upsets me is the weather complication. It does not work. I have the Asus ZW3 with Android 2.

author: Brenden Crowie
comment: This is the best watch face I've found. Unfortunately, though, the reflective animation does not work on my ZTE Quartz. It would be really awesome if we could use a plain black background for active mode as well as ambient mode. Otherwise, it's on my watch all the time.

author: cent_fl_ dude
comment: It doesn't work with the Michael Kors smartwatch:(

author: Javier Chang
comment: Very classy with Huawei smartwatch. Works perfectly with Android Wear 2.0. I have other watchface from the same Dev.....always top notch

author: John Farley
comment: Beautiful and professional looking watch face. Well worth the money.

author: Henry Varum
comment: I downloaded on my phone and when I try to download on my watch, is asking me to pay another 99 cents.

author: Adrian Giles
comment: Been my favourite face for a long time!

author: Max S
comment: Does work on SmartWatch 3. Owner does not reply to emails however

author: Abdul Ghani Najm
comment: Weather is not working. Otherwise it is a very beautiful face.
This is my favorite Watchface for my Q Founder, but since Android Wear 2.0 the battery drain is a major pain in my lower back. I'd love to see that fixed if possible.

author: Timothy Phan
comment: Latest update removed changing settings from the watch. So far there's no way to reincorporate the 3rd party complications from the phone app so I just lost a lot of functionality in this face.

author: William Unger
comment: No longer working on my LG smart watch.

author: Amin Bolouri
comment: Merge phone and watch battery widget please

author: J. Barnes
comment: I was using the Skymaster face and love it so much I bought more faces from the same maker.  This face looks GREAT.  It is very classy and understated like most high class watches are.  The problem is everything is not working.  The weather Complication is not working and the screen widget doesn't work. When I have used Other watchfaces from the same maker everything worked. I'm not sure what the difference is but it Would-be nice if they would fix it. The widget especially it doesn't show up at all

author: Carl Tindall
comment: Wear 2.0 weather workaround/option  For an easy weather complication not working fix, choose 3rd Party complications, scroll to weather by Google, BOOM!!! You will now have a working weather complication. Back to five stars bub.  Old review: Great face by a great developer. I've purchased a couple of different faces for different watches I have. This one looks great on the Fossil Q Marshal

author: Adrian Burns
comment: Love it but, since Wear 2.0 update, the edit cog in the Android Wear app when the face is selected seems to have disappeared. I have to manually open the app or make changes from the watch itself. A minor niggle for what is a really nice watch face, hopefully it gets a bug fix soon!

author: Andrew Steffy
comment: Was great, but now doesn't display at all. Only black screen. Using lg watch sport

author: Edward Piekarski
comment: Weather is broken since last update,even when forcing location. Based on other reviews developer does not seem responsive.  Another crappy wear app. Hey Google, this is why Wear is going nowhere.

author: Mateusz Juraszek
comment: I really like colorful watch faces in ambient mode the developer is providing. The only reason why I give 4/5 stars is because of lack of dual battery. The dual battery is present on Roger and Skymaster watch faces I also bought and I see no reason to not have it here.

author: Jan Smolders
comment: Very sleek look. The glare effect could be smoother. Other than that really great

author: Vangelis Fitsios
comment: Weather doesn't update anymore. Looks good but kills the battery and as a result I have to uninstall it.

author: Zoltan Fekete
comment: Weather complication is broken since android wear 2.0 update.

author: Andy Alm
comment: My favorite watchface. Classy look while still being very functional. Very customizable.
I like it

author: Andy Ferdean
comment: Awesome watch face

author: Kyle Gospodnetich
comment: Can we get some additional OLED protection options? Thick lines on the ambient display can be too large for the burn in protection to move, and it'd be really nice to have thin lines or outlines of everything to correct this. As an example of doing it wrong, the stock Huawei watchface is forever burned into my previous watch due to the hands leaving a circle in the middle of the screen, and the bars around the screen being wider than the burn in protection moves the screen. The Google Fit faces do it right.
title: Minor request

author: Amjad Al Attar
comment: It's so elegant and well designed that you feel like you're wearing an omega, tag heuer, rolex, breitling, etc. Great job!
title: A design like those of the very famous and expensive watches!

author: Vince Badali
comment: Looks great, so many dial choices. It gives me the info I need at a glance. All of the dials work on my Huawei Watch. I love the glare change upon movement. Nice touch that adds some realism. Great work!
title: Best I've found

author: Samuel Lumentut
comment: I Oddesey and Ranger and this one from Zuhanden but I like this one the most. It really looks like am expensive watch. Keep up the good work dev!
title: Perfection!

author: Mats Söderlind
comment: The design is very nice but until I'm able to change the settings and not just get a "Unfortunately Sportive has stopped" that won't happen.
title: Would love to give it a higher rating

author: Darrell Caldwell
comment: One of the best looking Watch Faces available for Wear, the tilt/light FX give it a realistic look and combined with the elegant design make this watch face a classy and professional look for any watch. And the ability to quickly tweak the look in Interactive Mode just makes it that much better. Makes my Urbane look amazing!  The only improvement that could be made is to make it 2.0 compatible/publish on Wear Play Store so I can install it on my Huawei which is running Wear 2.0!
title: Absolutely Fantastic Watch Face!

author: Eru Teya
comment: Please make dials easier to read.
title: Dials are difficult to read

author: Dave Spina
comment: Excellent, clean looking, not pixelated. Looks like a real watch!  A+. My main watch face. People have no idea it's a smart watch. LG Urbane

author: Muhit Uddin
comment: I like it! Too many mediocre watch faces out there, but this one is good.
title: Impressed

author: Andy Hamilton
comment: Great watch. Would have given 5 if the weather field was more accurate.Weather updates spasmodically and rarely matches the weather app on phone.
title: Almost

author: Sarmed Ameen
comment: I really like the neat design and colors on this watchface but would you please add a deep black dial, it would looks really great on my Huawei AMOLED display, please!
title: Awesome ... But!

author: Ken Nwokolo
comment: Watch face looks like a normal watch but we all know that under the hood lies the awesome power of a super smart watch. Lots of customizations too!
title: Awesome

author: Arjoca Vlad
comment: I will give you 5 stars for the nice design...but please fix the phone battery display, it s not updating correctly ..
title: Bought it, but....

author: Andrew Payne
comment: Love it. Would love a few more accent colours and possible a jet black background with no tilt or lighting effects to optimise my OLED watch.
title: Fantastic watchface
